decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Location plan; Daylight and sunlight assessment prepared by Herrington dated September 2024; Fire Safety Compliance Statement; LM/10/2DH - 01 (Rev B) 'AS EXISTING' GROUND FLOOR PLAN; LM/10/2DH - 02 (Rev C) 'AS EXISTING' FIRST FLOOR PLAN; LM/10/2DH - 03 (Rev C) 'AS EXISTING' ROOF PLAN; LM/10/2DH - 04 (Rev B) 'AS EXISTING' FRONT ELEVATION; LM/10/2DH - 05 (Rev D) 'AS EXISTING' REAR ELEVATION; LM/10/2DH - 06 (Rev C) 'AS EXISTING' RIGHT FLANK ELEVATION; LM/10/2DH - 07 (Rev E) 'AS EXISTING' LEFT FLANK ELEVATION; LM/10/2DH - 08 (Rev C) 'AS EXISTING' SECTION 'A-A'; LM/10/2DH - 09 (Rev B) 'AS EXISTING' SECTION 'B-B'; LM/10/2DH - 10 (Rev C) 'AS EXISTING' SECTION 'C-C'; LM/10/2DH - 21 (Rev A) 'AS EXISTING' 1:100 SITE PLAN; LM/10/2DH -11/E (Rev D) 'AS PROPOSED' GROUND FLOOR PLAN; LM/10/2DH - 12/E (Rev B) 'AS PROPOSED' FIRST FLOOR PLAN; LM/10/2DH - 13/E (Rev C) 'AS PROPOSED' SECOND FLOOR PLAN; LM/10/2DH - 14/E (Rev B) 'AS PROPOSED' ROOF PLAN; LM/10/2DH - 15/E (Rev D) 'AS PROPOSED' FRONT ELEVATION; LM/10/2DH - 16/E (Rev E) 'AS PROPOSED' REAR ELEVATION; LM/10/2DH - 17/E (Rev D) 'AS PROPOSED' LEFT FLANK ELEVATION; LM/10/2DH - 18/E (Rev D) 'AS PROPOSED' RIGHT FLANK ELEVATION; LM/10/2DH - 19/E (Rev E) 'AS PROPOSED' SECTION 'D-D'; LM/10/2DH - 20/E (Rev C) 'AS PROPOSED' SECTION 'E-E'; LM/10/2DH - 22/E (Rev B) 'AS PROPOSED' 1:100 SITE PLAN.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Ground floor rear wraparound extension; part second floor rear outrigger extension; widening of the existing outrigger; installation of roof lights to the side, alterations to openings and fenestration.
